item.title: Want To Step Up Your Android Learning Game? You Need To Read This First
item.description: DISCLAIMER: If you consider yourself a beginner, intermediate, expert or a ninja in the Android realm, this secret sauce still applies to you. TL;DR: Build Something. No really! I am not kidding here. Hear me out on this. The secret to becoming better at Android development, with all the new shiny stuff being released every year and making you go through the fear of missing out and what not is just to build out something thatâ€™s functional, even before reading a blog post or documentation.
